title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the knowledge sources to be integrated, the desired features and functionalities, and the target users and use cases.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flows, and integration points.

title: Design Data Model
description: Design the data model for storing and representing the knowledge graph and its associated metadata.

title: Develop Web Crawling and Data Extraction Components
description: Develop components for crawling the web and extracting relevant information from various sources.

title: Develop Knowledge Graph Enrichment and Reasoning Components
description: Develop components for enriching the knowledge graph with new information and performing reasoning tasks.

title: Develop User Interface and Contribution Mechanisms
description: Develop the user interface and mechanisms for users to contribute and validate knowledge graph information.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to protect the system and user data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the application, covering installation, usage, and maintenance.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Develop Web Crawling and Data Extraction Components
Develop Knowledge Graph Enrichment and Reasoning Components
Develop User Interface and Contribution Mechanisms
